WardPollutionData.title: WardPollutionData
WardPollutionData.description: Represents pollution data for a specific ward.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ward pollution data entry.

lat.description: Latitude coordinate of the ward's location.

lng.description: Longitude coordinate of the ward's location.

aqi.description: Air Quality Index value for the ward.

definition.description: Stores pollution data for each ward in Bengaluru. The data includes ward name, coordinates (lat/lng), and air quality index (aqi).
